attributes.action: Stop these covid draconian measures being implimented to take our freedoms.
attributes.additional_details:
These draconian measures that have been introduced will only end up killing more people from mental health issues, and inability to gain medical treatment for other issues. 
Covid has a very low mortality rate and your figures are comical to say the least
attributes.background: The tory Party are not there to govern our health and therefore should stick to governing the country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we are not sure which measures you would like to be reversed.

You may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
                
Or you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
